chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
items.plainText: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.

items.text: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
items.plainText: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

items.text: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
items.plainText: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.

items.text: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.
items.plainText: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.

items.text: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.
items.plainText: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.

items.text: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.
items.plainText: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.

items.text: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.
items.plainText: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.

items.text: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
items.plainText: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

items.text: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.
items.plainText: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.

items.text: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.
items.plainText: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.

items.text: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name's sake: for thy righteousness' sake bring my soul out of trouble.
items.plainText: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name's sake: for thy righteousness' sake bring my soul out of trouble.

items.text: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
items.plainText: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
